alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Dubois; Harrison; Perry (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 2:30AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT HARRISON...SOUTHERN DUBOIS... SOUTHEASTERN CRAWFORD...PERRY...NORTHWESTERN MEADE AND NORTH CENTRAL BRECKINRIDGE COUNTIES THROUGH 300 AM EDT/200 AM CDT/... At 230 AM EDT/130 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Corydon to Dale. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tell City, Corydon, Brandenburg, Carefree Town, Mount Pleasant, Ferdinand, Leopold, Lanesville, Troy and Leavenworth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
